original_text: And falling to his knees he cried out with a loud voice, “Lord, do not hold this sin against them.” And when he had said this, he fell asleep.
korean_text: 무릎을 꿇고 크게 불러 이르되 주여 이 죄를 그들에게 돌리지 마옵소서 이 말을 하고 자니라

sentences.original_text: he cried out with a loud voice
Lord, do not hold this sin against them
sentences.korean_translation: 주님, 이 죄를 그들에게 돌리지 마소서

sentences.original_text: And when he had said this
